attributes.action: remove the Speaker of the house, Micheal Martin!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker of the House has currently a serious problem with the expenses scandle in the House, in my opinion he should be removed, and as soon as possible, before any further damage is done.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
